Summary: low flying, blinding, circle of light
trends: There has been one other sighting in Northern Cambria
There were no other sightings in Northern Cambria on or around September 26th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling on number nine road ,in my car, outside of northern cambria at about one twenty a.m. I noticed this exteremely bright light about 500 feet above and about 200 feet away from my vehicle.You couln't miss it; the light was almost oppressively bright. So, I stop, turn down the music and stick my head out of the window to try and hear some noise in case it was just a helicopter. I didnt' hear anything. The light it was emitting was steady, circular and bright. A few seconds later it shot off over the horizon, it traveled so fast it looked like a shooting star.. The light trail it left was the longest i have ever seen and to my eyes it looked like it spand many many miles. I caught my breathe because i was in shock and probably close to a stroke or heart attack at the point. I pulled back on the road and was a little scared because i had to travel the same direction i saw the "ufo" travel.
